description:
I met Justin through another model and he was really interested in doing a video or two. The one thing that really struck me about Justin was that he seems to be one of the happiest guys I've ever met. I mean he's just smiling all the time and he has some neat stories about the things he's done.
Plus, I don't think I've ever seen anyone have quite as much fun doing a video as Justin did. He was just grinning from ear to ear through most of it.
title: Justin
